9cc61d11-0709-4c46-b1ee-7ed3acc6e89f: A ray of freezing air and ice projects from your pointing finger. You must succeed on a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} with the ray to deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to a target. The ray deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g}.
0a6b0fb8-c882-4b15-8043-19faa5330223: After the battle, you can dismiss area {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} effect at will. You must be out of combat and within a 100-foot range of the spell's effect. Dismissing a spell is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} that does not spend spell slots and does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
d7c86817-33b5-4d6d-9bbb-9d8d3502a6a2: Any creature within the area that fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} becomes drowsy and inattentive, taking a -5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception checks{/g} and a -2 penalty on Will saves against sleep effects while the lullaby is in effect.
4aee55cb-613f-4f33-9d4c-f2abaae01edf: The creature is unable to see well because of overstimulation of the eyes. A dazzled creature takes a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and sight-based {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception checks{/g}.
d1b98530-5e3b-454f-9196-a8770a89a935: This {g|Encyclopedia:Cantrips_Orisons}cantrip{/g} creates a burst of light. If you cause the light to burst in front of a single creature, that creature is dazzled for 1 minute unless it makes a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g}. Sightless creatures, as well as creatures already dazzled, are not affected by flare.
c0e86d7a-781f-4a36-bedf-443d46c88a35:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} clouds the mind of a humanoid creature with 4 or fewer {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} so that it takes no {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g}. Humanoids of 5 or more HD are not affected. A {g|ConditionDaze}dazed{/g} subject is not {g|ConditionStunned}stunned{/g}, so attackers get no special advantage against it. After a creature has been dazed by this spell, it is immune to the effects of this spell for 1 minute.
Dazed Condition: The creature is unable to act normally. A dazed creature can take no actions, but has no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
f4f7dab9-067a-4e11-a768-34f8661cd7c1:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} imbues the subject with a touch of divine guidance.
The creature gets a +1 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on a single {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g}.
5d694b8c-38c8-457e-aced-41966f02d04c: Upon casting this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, you target a living creature that has –1 or fewer {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}. That creature is automatically stabilized and does not lose any further hit points. If the creature later takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, it continues dying normally.
e0956857-560a-48f8-9219-4453326fa2df: With a touch, you infuse a creature with a tiny surge of life, granting the subject 1 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit point{/g}.
fe620403-5b61-4d77-9e8d-2fbd58c4c22f: You cause a spark of electricity to strike the target with a successful ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}.
7b5435a9-c8ce-415c-bc61-cc25bafcbe42:
You channel negative energy through your touch, fatiguing the target. You must succeed on a touch {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} to strike a target. The subject is immediately {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g} for the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s duration.
This spell has no effect on a creature that is already fatigued. Unlike with normal fatigue, the effect ends as soon as the spell's duration expires.
b453b512-2b56-4e15-8ae0-53df07a87235: You direct a ray of positive energy. You must make a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit, and if the ray hits an undead creature, it deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to it.
b5e7ea3a-da12-410d-a1e0-a15d8a7b2079: You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}.
98584a2f-8a5f-4fef-b452-b278efe4ac53: You unleash your divine powers against a single target. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} points of divine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} halves the damage.
